titles.title: To revise the boundaries of John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Gasparilla Island Unit in Florida.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Natural Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs.

committee.subcommittee: Fisheries, Wildlife, Oceans, and Insular Affairs
committee.name: House Natural Resources

bill.summary: 4/26/2013--Introduced. Replaces the map subtitled "Gasparilla Island Unit FL-70P" included in the set of maps entitled "Coastal Barrier Resources System" (referred to in specified provisions of the Coastal Barrier Resources Act and relating to the Gasparilla Island Unit in Florida) with another map relating to the same unit entitled "John H. Chafee Coastal Barrier Resources System Corrected Gasparilla Unit FL-70/FL-70P," draft dated May 23, 2012.
